title: Silicon Valley’s Drive to Get AI Into America’s Schools Is Working
description: Educators across the country are bringing chatbots into their lesson plans. Will it help kids learn or is it just another doomed ed-tech fad?

title: What Is the GPS Jamming That Disrupted EU Commission President’s Flight?
description: After a plane carrying European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen suffered a GPS navigation outage on its approach to Plovdiv in Bulgaria on Aug. 31, authorities in the country said the signal had likely been jammed by Russia.

title: Goldman-Backed Boyd Weighs Sale of Thermal Business
description: Boyd Corp. is exploring a sale of its thermal management solutions business, people familiar with the matter said, amid rising demand for air-cooling systems for data centers.
